url.title: Config url.
url.description: Provide the url to load your tab rotate config.

retry_count.title: Retry count (default: 5)
retry_count.description: How often should the extension try to load the config until it gives up. -1 for infinite.

retry_interval.title: Retry interval in seconds (default: 60s)
retry_interval.description: How long should the extension wait to retry loading the config after an error occured.

reload_interval.title: Reload interval in seconds (default: 60s)
reload_interval.description: How often should we reload the config and check if there were any changes.
